articles.author: Shania Shelton
articles.title: ‘Big one to eliminate’: Elon Musk spotlights cost of federal entitlements amid fear of cuts to programs - CNN
articles.description: Elon Musk on Monday highlighted the cost of federal spending on entitlement programs, the latest sign of the tech billionaire and presidential adviser’s focus to downsize the federal government amid fears of cuts to Social Security, Medicare and Medicaid.
